name: Magistus Verre Cendrillon
text:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects;
? Add 1 "Magistus" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
? Return 1 of your banished Level 4 or lower Spellcaster monsters to the GY.
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Magistus" monster you control; equip 1 "Magistus" monster from your GY to it, except a Level 4 monster. You can only use each effect of "Magistus Verre Cendrillon" once per turn.
